author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بوده براستی میگویم ندای احلی را بشنوید و خود را از آلایش نفس و هوی مقدّس دارید الیوم ساکنین بساط احدیّه و مستقرّین سرر عزّ صمدانیّه اگر قوت لایموت نداشته باشند بمال یهود دست دراز
translation: Verily I say: Incline your ears to My sweet voice, and sanctify yourselves from the defilement of your evil passions and corrupt desires. They who dwell within the tabernacle of God, and are established upon the seats of everlasting glory, will refuse, though they be dying of hunger, to stretch their hands and seize unlawfully the property of their neighbor, however vile and worthless he may be.
